jobs.title: Senior React Developer
jobs.description:
We're looking for a Senior React Developer to join our front-end team working on enterprise SaaS applications. You'll be responsible for architecting and implementing complex UI components, optimizing application performance, and mentoring junior developers.

Responsibilities:
- Design and implement scalable React components and applications
- Work with REST APIs and GraphQL to integrate front-end with back-end services
- Implement state management solutions using Redux or Context API
- Optimize application performance and ensure cross-browser compatibility
- Collaborate with UX designers to implement responsive, accessible interfaces

Requirements:
- 5+ years of experience with React and modern JavaScript
- Strong understanding of state management, hooks, and React best practices
- Experience with TypeScript and testing frameworks (Jest, React Testing Library)
- Knowledge of modern build tools and CI/CD pipelines
- Excellent problem-solving and communication skills

jobs.title: DevOps Engineer
jobs.description:
We're seeking a DevOps Engineer to help us build and maintain our cloud infrastructure and CI/CD pipelines. You'll work closely with development teams to automate deployment processes and ensure system reliability and security.

Responsibilities:
- Design and implement cloud infrastructure using AWS services
- Create and maintain CI/CD pipelines for automated testing and deployment
- Implement monitoring, logging, and alerting solutions
- Optimize system performance and cost-efficiency
- Collaborate with development teams to resolve infrastructure issues

Requirements:
- 3+ years of experience with AWS and infrastructure as code (Terraform, CloudFormation)
- Experience with containerization (Docker) and orchestration (Kubernetes)
- Knowledge of CI/CD tools (Jenkins, GitHub Actions, CircleCI)
- Familiarity with monitoring tools (Prometheus, Grafana, ELK stack)
- Strong scripting skills (Bash, Python)

jobs.title: Backend Node.js Developer
jobs.description:
We're looking for a Backend Developer with Node.js expertise to join our team building microservices for our enterprise platform. You'll design and implement scalable APIs, integrate with databases, and ensure high performance and reliability.

Responsibilities:
- Design and develop RESTful APIs and microservices using Node.js
- Implement database schemas and queries (PostgreSQL, MongoDB)
- Ensure code quality through testing and code reviews
- Optimize application performance and scalability
- Collaborate with front-end developers for seamless integration

Requirements:
- 3+ years of experience with Node.js and Express
- Strong knowledge of SQL and NoSQL databases
- Experience with microservices architecture
- Understanding of authentication and security best practices
- Familiarity with message queues and event-driven architecture

jobs.title: Data Engineer
jobs.description:
We're seeking a Data Engineer to help us build and maintain our data infrastructure. You'll design data pipelines, implement ETL processes, and ensure data quality and accessibility for our analytics team.

Responsibilities:
- Design and implement data pipelines using modern tools and frameworks
- Create and optimize ETL processes for various data sources
- Implement data quality checks and monitoring
- Collaborate with data scientists and analysts to support their data needs
- Maintain and optimize data warehouse architecture

Requirements:
- 3+ years of experience in data engineering
- Proficiency with Python and SQL
- Experience with data processing frameworks (Apache Spark, Airflow)
- Knowledge of cloud data services (AWS Redshift, S3, Glue)
- Understanding of data modeling and warehouse design

jobs.title: UI/UX Designer
jobs.description:
We're looking for a UI/UX Designer to create intuitive and engaging user experiences for our enterprise applications. You'll work closely with product managers and developers to design interfaces that balance user needs with business goals.

Responsibilities:
- Create wireframes, prototypes, and high-fidelity mockups
- Conduct user research and usability testing
- Develop and maintain design systems and component libraries
- Create user flows and journey maps
- Collaborate with developers to ensure accurate implementation

Requirements:
- 3+ years of experience in UI/UX design for web applications
- Proficiency with design tools (Figma, Adobe XD)
- Understanding of accessibility standards and responsive design
- Experience with user research methodologies
- Portfolio demonstrating strong visual design skills

jobs.title: QA Automation Engineer
jobs.description:
We're seeking a QA Automation Engineer to help us ensure the quality and reliability of our software products. You'll design and implement automated test frameworks, create test cases, and work with development teams to resolve issues.

Responsibilities:
- Design and implement automated test frameworks and scripts
- Create comprehensive test plans and test cases
- Execute manual and automated tests across different environments
- Report and track bugs through issue tracking systems
- Collaborate with developers to resolve quality issues

Requirements:
- 2+ years of experience in QA automation
- Proficiency with test automation tools and frameworks (Selenium, Cypress, Jest)
- Knowledge of programming languages (JavaScript, Python)
- Experience with CI/CD pipelines and test integration
- Strong analytical and problem-solving skills

jobs.title: Mobile App Developer (React Native)
jobs.description:
We're looking for a Mobile App Developer with React Native expertise to help us build cross-platform mobile applications. You'll work on developing new features, improving performance, and ensuring a seamless user experience across iOS and Android platforms.

Responsibilities:
- Develop and maintain mobile applications using React Native
- Implement responsive UI components and integrate with APIs
- Optimize application performance and ensure cross-platform compatibility
- Collaborate with designers and backend developers
- Troubleshoot and fix bugs and performance bottlenecks

Requirements:
- 3+ years of experience with React Native development
- Strong knowledge of JavaScript/TypeScript
- Experience with native modules and third-party libraries
- Understanding of mobile app architecture and state management
- Familiarity with app deployment processes for iOS and Android

jobs.title: Product Manager
jobs.description:
We're seeking a Product Manager to lead the development of our enterprise SaaS products. You'll work closely with stakeholders, designers, and developers to define product vision, prioritize features, and ensure successful delivery.

Responsibilities:
- Define product vision, strategy, and roadmap
- Gather and prioritize requirements from stakeholders and customers
- Create detailed product specifications and user stories
- Collaborate with design and development teams throughout the product lifecycle
- Analyze market trends and competitor offerings

Requirements:
- 4+ years of experience in product management for software products
- Strong understanding of software development lifecycle
- Experience with agile methodologies and project management tools
- Excellent communication and presentation skills
- Analytical mindset with ability to make data-driven decisions

jobs.title: Technical Content Writer
jobs.description:
We're looking for a Technical Content Writer to create high-quality documentation, tutorials, and blog posts for our developer community. You'll work closely with our engineering team to explain complex technical concepts in clear, accessible language.

Responsibilities:
- Create technical documentation for APIs, SDKs, and developer tools
- Write tutorials and how-to guides for developers
- Produce blog posts on technical topics and product updates
- Review and edit content for technical accuracy and clarity
- Collaborate with engineers and product managers to gather information

Requirements:
- 2+ years of experience in technical writing for software products
- Strong understanding of software development concepts
- Excellent writing and editing skills
- Ability to explain complex technical concepts clearly
- Familiarity with documentation tools and markdown

jobs.title: Frontend Developer (Vue.js)
jobs.description:
We're seeking a Frontend Developer with Vue.js expertise for a short-term project to revamp our customer portal. You'll work on implementing new UI components, improving performance, and enhancing the overall user experience.

Responsibilities:
- Develop responsive UI components using Vue.js
- Implement state management using Vuex or Pinia
- Optimize application performance and loading times
- Ensure cross-browser compatibility and accessibility
- Collaborate with designers and backend developers

Requirements:
- 2+ years of experience with Vue.js development
- Strong knowledge of JavaScript/TypeScript
- Experience with Vue CLI, Vuex, and Vue Router
- Understanding of responsive design and CSS preprocessors
- Familiarity with testing frameworks (Jest, Vue Test Utils)
